chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The fire witch is an evil spirit.  She has a broom which shoots fire out of it.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions have two glyphs, one from "霝" and " heart ". The second type is from "霝" from " show ", and " show " is like the tablet of the gods. This word is the original word for the " spirit " of the gods (Yang Shuda). The character for " ling " in Xiaozhuan is derived from " yu ", and "Shuawen" or " witch " in its body may be related to the spirit of witch, which is the god of jade. "Said Wen": "𩆜, 𩆜 witch. The jade is the god. The sound from the jade. The spirit, 𤫊 or the witch."

From the " show " of the " spirit " inscriptions as a title, Geng pot: "offer to the public of the Spirit", "public spirit" that is, "Qi Ling" (Guo), Qi Guojun Lord. From the " spirit " of the " heart ", the inscription means beauty, and Qin Gongzhong: "spirit" means a beautiful bell. "Guang Ya. Interpretation: "Spirit, goodness."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions have two glyphs, one from "霝" from "心". The second type is from "霝" from " show ", and " show " is like the tablet of the gods. This word is the original word for the " spirit " of the gods (Yang Shuda). The character for " ling " in Xiaozhuan is derived from " yu ", and "Shuawen" or " witch " in its body may be related to the spirit of witch, which is the god of jade.
humanum_full_description:
金文有兩種字形，一種從「霝」從「心」。第二種從「霝」從「示」，「示」象神主牌位，此字是神靈的「靈」的本字(楊樹達)。小篆「靈」字從「玉」，《說文》或體從「巫」，可能與靈巫以玉事神有關。《說文》：「𩆜，𩆜巫。以玉事神。从玉霝聲。靈，𤫊或从巫。」

　　從「示」的「靈」金文用作稱號，庚壺：「獻于靈公之所」，「靈公」即「齊靈公」(郭沫若)，齊國君主。從「心」的「靈」金文表示美好，秦公鐘：「靈音」，表示美好的鐘聲。《廣雅．釋詁》：「靈，善也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文有兩種字形，一種從「霝」從「心」。第二種從「霝」從「示」，「示」象神主牌位，此字是神靈的「靈」的本字(楊樹達)。小篆「靈」字從「玉」，《說文》或體從「巫」，可能與靈巫以玉事神有關。

①有效驗：靈驗。靈丹妙藥。
②聰明，不呆滯：靈巧。機靈。靈慧。
③敏捷的心理活動：靈機。靈感。靈性。
④精神：靈魂。心靈。英靈。
⑤舊時稱神或關於神仙的：神靈。精靈。
⑥反映敏捷，活動迅速：靈活。靈犀。靈便(biàn)。
⑦關於死人的：幽靈。靈魂。靈柩。

金文有兩種字形，一種從「 霝 」從「 心 」。第二種從「 霝 」從「 示 」，「 示 」象神主牌位，此字是神靈的「 靈 」的本字(楊樹達)。小篆「 靈 」字從「 玉 」，《說文》或體從「 巫 」，可能與靈巫以玉事神有關。《說文》：「𩆜，𩆜巫。以玉事神。从玉霝聲。靈，𤫊或从巫。」 從「 示 」的「 靈 」金文用作稱號，庚壺：「獻于靈公之所」，「靈公」即「齊靈公」(郭沫若)，齊國君主。從「 心 」的「 靈 」金文表示美好，秦公鐘：「靈音」，表示美好的鐘聲。《廣雅．釋詁》：「靈，善也。」
Bronze inscriptions have two glyphs, one from " 霝" and " heart". The second type is from " 霝" from " show", and " show" is like the tablet of the gods. This word is the original word for the " spirit" of the gods (Yang Shuda). The character for " ling" in Xiaozhuan is derived from " yu", and "Shuawen" or " witch" in its body may be related to the spirit of witch, which is the god of jade. "Said Wen": "𩆜, 𩆜 witch. The jade is the god. The sound from the jade. The spirit, 𤫊 or the witch." From the " show" of the " spirit" inscriptions as a title, Geng pot: "offer to the public of the Spirit", "public spirit" that is, "Qi Ling" (Guo), Qi Guojun Lord. From the " spirit" of the " heart", the inscription means beauty, and Qin Gongzhong: "spirit" means a beautiful bell. "Guang Ya. Interpretation: "Spirit, goodness."

靈字的基本解释

靈
lìng
见“灵”。

靈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
“灵1”的繁体字。亦作“霊1”。“霛1”的今字。
(1)指巫。
(2)神灵；鬼怪。
(3)天；天帝。
(4)魂灵。
(5)精神；感情。
(6)灵气；精气。
(7)应验；灵验。
(8)神奇，灵异。
(9)灵光；神光。
(10)威灵。
(11)有灵性者；有神灵者。
(12)聪明，通晓事理。
(13)圣明。
(14)指圣贤，明哲。
(15)灵敏，灵活。
(16)善，美好。
(17)尊称死者的遗体。
(18)指灵柩。
(19)福气，福分。
(20)通“令”。政令，法令。
(21)通“零”。零落。
(22)通“軨”。车厢上的窗棂。
(23)姓。春秋晋有灵辄。见《左传·宣公二年》。

靈字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　靈； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1380第24
〔古文〕霛????【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?郞丁切，音鈴。【玉篇】神靈也。【大戴禮】陽之精氣曰神，隂之精氣曰靈。【書·泰誓】惟人萬物之靈。【傳】靈，神也。【詩·大雅】以赫厥靈。又【大雅·靈臺傳】神之精明者稱靈。　又【詩·鄘風】靈雨旣零。【箋】靈，善也。　又【廣韻】福也。　又【廣韻】巫也。【楚辭·九歌】思靈保兮賢姱。　又靈氛，古之善占者。【屈原·離騷】欲從靈氛之吉占兮。　又【周禮·地官·鼓人】以靈鼓鼓社祭。【註】靈鼓，六面鼓也。　又【禮·檀弓】塗車芻靈。【註】芻靈，束茅爲人。　又【左傳·定九年】載蔥靈。【註】蔥靈，輺車名。　又【楚辭·天問】曜靈安臧。【註】曜靈，日也。又【揚雄·羽獵賦】上獵三靈之旒。【註】如淳曰：三靈，日月星垂象之應也。　又【廣韻】寵也。　又【禮·禮運】何謂四靈，麟鳳龜龍。【爾雅·釋魚】二曰靈龜。【註】卽今觜蠵龜。一名靈蠵，能鳴。【史記·龜筴傳】下有伏靈，上有兔絲。　又【諡法】亂而不損曰靈，不勤成名曰靈，死而志成曰靈，死見神能曰靈

暂无。

spirit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
Traditional characters for "灵1". Also known as "霊1". The present word for "霛1".
(1) Refers to witches.
(2) Gods; ghosts.
(3) Heaven; Emperor of Heaven.
(4) Soul.
(5) Spirit; feelings.
(6) Reiki; Essence.
(7) Fulfilled; efficacious.
(8) Miraculous and supernatural.
(9) Aura; Shenguang.
(10) Welling.
(11) Those with spirituality; those with gods.
(12) Smart and knowledgeable.
(13) Shengming.
(14) Refers to sages and wise men.
(15) Sensitive and flexible.
(16) Goodness and beauty.
(17) Respectfully the remains of the deceased.
(18) Refers to the coffin.
(19) Blessings, blessings.
(20) Pass "Order". Decree, decree.
(21) Pass "zero". scattered.
(22) Through "軨". Window lattices on the carriage.
(23) Last name. The spring and autumn seasons are spiritual. See "Zuo Zhuan·Xuangong Two Years".
spirit
